item.title: Reduce local test kitchen runtimes
item.description: At Zanui we’ve been working with Vagrant, Puppet and Chef for quite a while. We’re happy with these tools, at least most of the time. A major discomfort is the time taken to download any kind of assets during provisioning, e.g. Omnibus: Chef Install Apt update / packages Pip packages … While this is annoying it’s usually not an issue for non-repetitive runs. These usually occur with a new team member or when a development box needs to be rebuild due to errors.
